thread.title: Mississippi state flag no longer flies over Jackson FBI office
thread.title_full: Mississippi state flag no longer flies over Jackson FBI office

author: Staff of Y'all Politics
title: Mississippi state flag no longer flies over Jackson FBI office
text: Mississippi state flag no longer flies over Jackson FBI office The agency released a statement saying the executive management made the decision to take it down a few weeks ago. "While we are all proud to live and work in Mississippi, leaving the flag in place could send a message that the FBI supports one side of the issue versus the other," the statement said. MSNEWSNOW Posted October 25, 2015 - 6:03 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
